model_answer: The answer is C: Event 11 – The announcer explicitly says, “Today’s episode was brought to you by Noom,” while the screen focuses on “NOOM Weight.” This indicates that the full-screen NOOM Weight promo was specifically promoted during this event, setting it up as the direct cause of the ad block running later.
